name: Fruits & Ghosts
description:
This is a post Ludum Dare 42 version!

The game it self is a fast paced co op puzzle game but you can play it also solo. The idea it self is pretty simple, you have to clear a stock of fruits by combining them. But each combination summons ghosts and this is the part where the game gets tricky. But a friend can help you with that part! She or he just need an android device with and game extending app (which is also a part of the zip file). Together the game become easier but also funnier.



But better than an explanation is always to try it out by your self ;)

The music was made by the awesome guy Kevin MacLeod

"Mischief Maker" & "Fluffing a Duck" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
